abilities.name: Living Vengeance
abilities.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

abilities.name: Blighted Quiver
abilities.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

abilities.name: Hail of Arrows
abilities.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

abilities.name: Chain of Corruption
abilities.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Venom Cask
abilities.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

abilities.name: Contaminate
abilities.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

abilities.name: Spray and Pray
abilities.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

abilities.name: Crimson Curse
abilities.description: Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing Health, but lacks innate Health Regeneration.

abilities.name: Head Rush
abilities.description: Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy / Snack Attack
abilities.description: Briar leaps forward and shatters her pillory, entering a Blood Frenzy that causes her to relentlessly pursue the nearest enemy (prioritizing champions). While frenzied, she gains increased Attack Speed and Move Speed, and her attacks deal damage in an area around her target. Briar can reactivate this ability while frenzied to take a CHOMP out of her target on her next attack, dealing additional damage based on their missing Health, and healing Briar based on the damage she deals.

abilities.name: Chilling Scream
abilities.description: Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max Health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall.

abilities.name: Certain Death
abilities.description: Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She then beelines straight to them, fearing other surrounding enemies upon arriving at her target, and enters a state of complete hemomania. She will pursue her prey until death, gaining the benefits of Blood Frenzy as well as additional Armor, Magic Resistance, Life Steal, and Move Speed.

abilities.name: Friend of the Forest
abilities.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience.

abilities.name: Rootcaller
abilities.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

abilities.name: Brushmaker
abilities.description: In brush, Ivern and his nearby allies attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

abilities.name: Triggerseed
abilities.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies. The shield refreshes if it hits no enemies.

abilities.name: Daisy!
abilities.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.

abilities.name: Dream-Laden Bough
abilities.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

abilities.name: Blooming Blows
abilities.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

abilities.name: Watch Out! Eep!
abilities.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

abilities.name: Swirlseed
abilities.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.

abilities.name: Lilting Lullaby
abilities.description: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.

abilities.name: Daredevil Impulse
abilities.description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by Immobilizing effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is Knocked Up , she also keeps them Knocked Up briefly.

abilities.name: Flair
abilities.description: Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.

abilities.name: Blade Whirl
abilities.description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.

abilities.name: Wild Rush
abilities.description: Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

abilities.name: Inferno Trigger
abilities.description: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.

abilities.name: Moonsilver Blade
abilities.description: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Crescent Strike
abilities.description: Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage. Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Pale Cascade
abilities.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

abilities.name: Lunar Rush
abilities.description: Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

abilities.name: Moonfall
abilities.description: Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them. If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

abilities.name: Reign of Anger
abilities.description: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

abilities.name: Cull the Meek
abilities.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

abilities.name: Ruthless Predator
abilities.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

abilities.name: Dominus
abilities.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

abilities.name: Get Excited!
abilities.description: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

abilities.name: Switcheroo!
abilities.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

abilities.name: Zap!
abilities.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

abilities.name: Flame Chompers!
abilities.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

abilities.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
abilities.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

abilities.name: Second Skin
abilities.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

abilities.name: Icathian Rain
abilities.description: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets. Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

abilities.name: Void Seeker
abilities.description: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive. Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

abilities.name: Supercharge
abilities.description: Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed. Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

abilities.name: Killer Instinct
abilities.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Rising Spell Force
abilities.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Mystic Shot
abilities.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Shift
abilities.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

abilities.name: Trueshot Barrage
abilities.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

abilities.name: Ki Barrier
abilities.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

abilities.name: Twilight Assault
abilities.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

abilities.name: Spirit's Refuge
abilities.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

abilities.name: Shadow Dash
abilities.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Stand United
abilities.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

abilities.name: Harrier
abilities.description: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable . Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

abilities.name: Blinding Assault
abilities.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

abilities.name: Heightened Senses
abilities.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

abilities.name: Behind Enemy Lines
abilities.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed. Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Sovereign's Domination
abilities.description: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

abilities.name: Blade of the Ruined King
abilities.description: Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health. Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

abilities.name: Spectral Maw
abilities.description: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Harrowed Path
abilities.description: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Heartbreaker
abilities.description: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.

abilities.name: Joy Unending
abilities.description: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.

abilities.name: Formless Blade
abilities.description: With a snap of her whip-blade, Nilah damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration.

abilities.name: Jubilant Veil
abilities.description: Nilah envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.

abilities.name: Apotheosis
abilities.description: Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon.

abilities.name: Inherent Glamour
abilities.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.

abilities.name: Blooming Burst
abilities.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

abilities.name: Shapesplitter
abilities.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack, briefly increasing her move speed. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction and recast to change the direction of the clone.

abilities.name: Tangle-Barbs
abilities.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damages and roots everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

abilities.name: Pop Blossom
abilities.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

abilities.name: Martial Poise
abilities.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

abilities.name: Fate's Call
abilities.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

abilities.name: Crimson Pact
abilities.description: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

abilities.name: Transfusion
abilities.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

abilities.name: Sanguine Pool
abilities.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

abilities.name: Tides of Blood
abilities.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

abilities.name: Hemoplague
abilities.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

abilities.name: Gathering Fire
abilities.description: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.description: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.description: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

abilities.name: Stage Presence
abilities.description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

abilities.name: High Note
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage in an area.

abilities.name: Surround Sound
abilities.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

abilities.name: Beat Drop
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Encore
abilities.description: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

abilities.name: Mark of the Storm
abilities.description: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

abilities.name: Thundering Shuriken
abilities.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

abilities.name: Electrical Surge
abilities.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

abilities.name: Lightning Rush
abilities.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

abilities.name: Slicing Maelstrom
abilities.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

abilities.name: Way of the Wanderer
abilities.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

abilities.name: Steel Tempest
abilities.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line. On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne . Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

abilities.name: Wind Wall
abilities.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blade
abilities.description: Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount. Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds. If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.description: Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm. For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

abilities.name: Dark Binding
abilities.description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Tormented Shadow
abilities.description: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.

abilities.name: Black Shield
abilities.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

abilities.name: Soul Shackles
abilities.description: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.

abilities.name: Junkyard Titan
abilities.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Flamespitter
abilities.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

abilities.name: Scrap Shield
abilities.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

abilities.name: Electro Harpoon
abilities.description: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

abilities.name: The Equalizer
abilities.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Illumination
abilities.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

abilities.name: Light Binding
abilities.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

abilities.name: Prismatic Barrier
abilities.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

abilities.name: Lucent Singularity
abilities.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Final Spark
abilities.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

abilities.name: Blade's End
abilities.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

abilities.name: Noxian Diplomacy
abilities.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

abilities.name: Rake
abilities.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

abilities.name: Assassin's Path
abilities.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

abilities.name: Loaded Dice
abilities.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

abilities.name: Wild Cards
abilities.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

abilities.name: Pick a Card
abilities.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

abilities.name: Destiny
abilities.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Assassin's Mark
abilities.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.

abilities.name: Five Point Strike
abilities.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.

abilities.name: Twilight Shroud
abilities.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

abilities.name: Shuriken Flip
abilities.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Perfect Execution
abilities.description: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

abilities.name: Petricite Burst
abilities.description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

abilities.name: Chain Lash
abilities.description: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

abilities.name: Kingslayer
abilities.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

abilities.name: Abscond / Abduct
abilities.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

abilities.name: Hijack
abilities.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

abilities.name: Contempt for the Weak
abilities.description: Zed's basic attacks against low health targets deals bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every few seconds against the same enemy champion.

abilities.name: Razor Shuriken
abilities.description: Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens. Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.

abilities.name: Living Shadow
abilities.description: Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability. Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

abilities.name: Shadow Slash
abilities.description: Zed and his Shadows slash, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds the mark triggers, repeating a portion of all the damage Zed dealt to the target while they were marked.

abilities.name: Rage Gene
abilities.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

abilities.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
abilities.description: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced. Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

abilities.name: Hyper / Wallop
abilities.description: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Move Speed. Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Hop / Crunch
abilities.description: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further. Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

abilities.name: GNAR!
abilities.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

abilities.name: Glorious Evolution
abilities.description: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.

abilities.name: Siphon Power
abilities.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack. Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.

abilities.name: Gravity Field
abilities.description: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies caught within its radius. Enemies who stay in the field for too long become stunned. Augment: Viktor's spells apply a slow to enemies.

abilities.name: Hextech Ray
abilities.description: Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. Augment: An explosion follows in the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Storm
abilities.description: Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field, dealing magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. The storm periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies and can be redirected by Viktor. Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.

abilities.name: Mana Barrier
abilities.description: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.

abilities.name: Rocket Grab
abilities.description: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

abilities.name: Power Fist
abilities.description: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.

abilities.name: Love Tap
abilities.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

abilities.name: Double Up
abilities.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

abilities.name: Strut
abilities.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

abilities.name: Make It Rain
abilities.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

abilities.name: Bullet Time
abilities.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

abilities.name: Absolution
abilities.description: When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance. Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.

abilities.name: Piercing Darkness
abilities.description: From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Last Embrace
abilities.description: Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay.

abilities.name: Curse of the Black Mist
abilities.description: Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.

abilities.name: Dawning Shadow
abilities.description: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

abilities.name: Staggering Blow
abilities.description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

abilities.name: Dredge Line
abilities.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage. Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.

abilities.name: Titan's Wrath
abilities.description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield. While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Depth Charge
abilities.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

abilities.name: Feline Friendship
abilities.description: Periodically, when Yuumi strikes a champion with an attack or ability, she restores health to herself and the next ally she Attaches to. While Attached, Yuumi generates a special bond with her allies. The ally with the strongest bond enhances Yuumi's abilities while she is Attached to them.

abilities.name: Prowling Projectile
abilities.description: Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally. While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.

abilities.name: You and Me!
abilities.description: Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Best Friend, she gains Heal & Shield Power and grants her Ally On-Hit healing.

abilities.name: Zoomies
abilities.description: Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.

abilities.name: Final Chapter
abilities.description: Yuumi channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse.

abilities.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
abilities.description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

abilities.name: Glitterlance
abilities.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that damages and heavily slows all enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Whimsy
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.

abilities.name: Help, Pix!
abilities.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

abilities.name: Wild Growth
abilities.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Z-Drive Resonance
abilities.description: Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.

abilities.name: Timewinder
abilities.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

abilities.name: Parallel Convergence
abilities.description: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time.

abilities.name: Phase Dive
abilities.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

abilities.name: Chronobreak
abilities.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

abilities.name: Way of the Hunter
abilities.description: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.

abilities.name: Mortal Steel
abilities.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line. On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne .

abilities.name: Spirit Cleave
abilities.description: Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe. Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed.

abilities.name: Soul Unbound
abilities.description: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit.

abilities.name: Fate Sealed
abilities.description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.

abilities.name: King's Tribute
abilities.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

abilities.name: Prowl
abilities.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt , granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

abilities.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies. As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

abilities.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

abilities.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
abilities.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

abilities.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
abilities.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

abilities.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
abilities.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

abilities.name: Bone Skewer
abilities.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

abilities.name: Ghostwater Dive
abilities.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

abilities.name: Phantom Undertow
abilities.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

abilities.name: An Acquired Taste
abilities.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste . At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion. Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste , they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

abilities.name: Abyssal Dive
abilities.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat. Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.

abilities.name: Cursed Touch
abilities.description: Amumu's basic attacks Curse his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

abilities.name: Bandage Toss
abilities.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

abilities.name: Despair
abilities.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.

abilities.name: Tantrum
abilities.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.

abilities.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
abilities.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse , damaging and stunning them.

abilities.name: Void Stone
abilities.description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

abilities.name: Null Sphere
abilities.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Blade
abilities.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

abilities.name: Force Pulse
abilities.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

abilities.name: Riftwalk
abilities.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Living Battery
abilities.description: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Burst Fire
abilities.description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

abilities.name: Ultrashock Laser
abilities.description: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.

abilities.name: Spark Surge
abilities.description: Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches.

abilities.name: Lightning Crash
abilities.description: Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies.

abilities.name: Hemorrhage
abilities.description: Darius' attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Darius enrages and gains massive Attack Damage when his target reaches max stacks.

abilities.name: Decimate
abilities.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade.

abilities.name: Crippling Strike
abilities.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Move Speed is slowed.

abilities.name: Apprehend
abilities.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

abilities.name: Noxian Guillotine
abilities.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Death Defied
abilities.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

abilities.name: Lay Waste
abilities.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

abilities.name: Wall of Pain
abilities.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

abilities.name: Defile
abilities.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Janna's allies gain Move Speed moving towards her. Janna deals a portion of bonus Move Speed as bonus magic damage on hit and with Zephyr.

abilities.name: Howling Gale
abilities.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Move Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed.

abilities.name: Eye Of The Storm
abilities.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Monsoon
abilities.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

abilities.name: Salvation
abilities.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

abilities.name: Starcall
abilities.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

abilities.name: Astral Infusion
abilities.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

abilities.name: Equinox
abilities.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.

abilities.name: Call of the Freljord
abilities.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

abilities.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
abilities.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it. The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Snowball Barrage
abilities.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies. When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

abilities.name: Eternal Hunger
abilities.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

abilities.name: Jaws of the Beast
abilities.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

abilities.name: Blood Hunt
abilities.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

abilities.name: Primal Howl
abilities.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

abilities.name: Infinite Duress
abilities.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Umbra Blades
abilities.description: Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

abilities.name: Duskbringer
abilities.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Shroud of Darkness
abilities.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

abilities.name: Unspeakable Horror
abilities.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

abilities.name: Serpentine Grace
abilities.description: All Move Speed bonuses are more effective on Cassiopeia.

abilities.name: Noxious Blast
abilities.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

abilities.name: Twin Fang
abilities.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

abilities.name: Doom 'n Gloom
abilities.description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.

abilities.name: Mistral Bolt
abilities.description: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.

abilities.name: Personal Space
abilities.description: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Looming Darkness
abilities.description: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.

abilities.name: Shadow Surge
abilities.description: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion. Recast to dash to them and deal damage.

abilities.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
abilities.description: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

abilities.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
abilities.description: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit.

abilities.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
abilities.description: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
abilities.description: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

abilities.name: Void Rush
abilities.description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health.

abilities.name: Goes Where He Pleases
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown. Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

abilities.name: Infected Bonesaw
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.

abilities.name: Heart Zapper
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Trauma
abilities.description: Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health. Active - Dr. Mundo slams his medical bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.

abilities.name: Maximum Dosage
abilities.description: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.

abilities.name: Signature of the Visionary
abilities.description: Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch. Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.

abilities.name: Subject: Disaster
abilities.description: Hwei envisions a series of disasters, allowing him to paint a devastating blow. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with damaging abilities: Devastating Fire, Severing Bolt, and Molten Fissure.

abilities.name: Subject: Serenity
abilities.description: Hwei envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.

abilities.name: Subject: Torment
abilities.description: Hwei envisions a series of torments, allowing him to paint controlling visages. This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with crowd control abilities: Grim Visage, Gaze of the Abyss, and Crushing Maw.

abilities.name: Spiraling Despair
abilities.description: Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies.

abilities.name: Sunlight
abilities.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Shield of Daybreak
abilities.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

abilities.name: Zenith Blade
abilities.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.

abilities.name: Garden of Thorns
abilities.description: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level. Zyra can cast Deadly Spines or Grasping Roots near seeds to grow plants, who fight for Zyra.

abilities.name: Deadly Spines
abilities.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.

abilities.name: Rampant Growth
abilities.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.

abilities.name: Grasping Roots
abilities.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Move Speed.

abilities.name: Stranglethorns
abilities.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts. Plants within the thicket are enraged.

abilities.name: A Thousand Cuts
abilities.description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.

abilities.name: Snip Snip!
abilities.description: Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip.

abilities.name: Hallowed Mist
abilities.description: Gwen summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist.

abilities.name: Skip 'n Slash
abilities.description: Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage On-Hit for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded.

abilities.name: Needlework
abilities.description: Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit. This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage.

abilities.name: Trial by Fire
abilities.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

abilities.name: Parrrley
abilities.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

abilities.name: Remove Scurvy
abilities.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

abilities.name: Powder Keg
abilities.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

abilities.name: Cannon Barrage
abilities.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target. Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

abilities.name: Glory in Death
abilities.description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Decimating Smash
abilities.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

abilities.name: Soul Furnace
abilities.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

abilities.name: Roar of the Slayer
abilities.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
abilities.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

abilities.name: Iceborn Subjugation
abilities.description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

abilities.name: Frozen Tomb
abilities.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

abilities.name: Flash Frost
abilities.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

abilities.name: Glacial Storm
abilities.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

abilities.name: Soul Eater
abilities.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

abilities.name: Siphoning Strike
abilities.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.

abilities.name: Spirit Fire
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Fury of the Sands
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Whisper
abilities.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of Move Speed.

abilities.name: Dancing Grenade
abilities.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

abilities.name: Deadly Flourish
abilities.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.

abilities.name: Captive Audience
abilities.description: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

abilities.name: Curtain Call
abilities.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

abilities.name: Unseen Predator
abilities.description: While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace , granting bonus attack damage.

abilities.name: Savagery
abilities.description: Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage. Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Battle Roar
abilities.description: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

abilities.name: Bola Strike
abilities.description: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.

abilities.name: Thrill of the Hunt
abilities.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

abilities.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
abilities.description: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

abilities.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
abilities.description: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

abilities.name: Violent Tendencies
abilities.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

abilities.name: Jousting
abilities.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

abilities.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
abilities.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

abilities.name: Echoing Flames
abilities.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

abilities.name: Corrosive Charge
abilities.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

abilities.name: Disdain
abilities.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

abilities.name: Fear Beyond Death
abilities.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

abilities.name: Lightslinger
abilities.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
