abilities.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

abilities.name: The Culling
abilities.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

abilities.name: Ravenous Flock
abilities.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

abilities.name: Death's Hand
abilities.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

abilities.name: Vision of Empire
abilities.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

abilities.name: Nevermove
abilities.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.

abilities.name: Demonic Ascension
abilities.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions.

abilities.name: Cosmic Creator
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of Stardust , which permanently improves each of his abilities.

abilities.name: Breath of Light
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion.

abilities.name: Astral Flight
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying. Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol. Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it. The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health. Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold.

abilities.name: Falling Star / The Skies Descend
abilities.description: Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend. The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which

abilities.name: Berserker Rage
abilities.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Tough It Out
abilities.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.

abilities.name: Reckless Swing
abilities.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

abilities.name: Ragnarok
abilities.description: Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.

abilities.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
abilities.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Twin Bite
abilities.description: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

abilities.name: Burnout
abilities.description: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.description: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Descent
abilities.description: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

abilities.name: Vow of the First Lands
abilities.description: Yunara's Critical Strikes deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Cultivation of Spirit
abilities.description: Yunara gains Attack Speed, bonus damage On-Hit, and her Attacks spread to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Arc of Judgment | Arc of Ruin
abilities.description: Yunara fires a spinning prayer bead that deals damage and slows enemies. While in her Transcendent State she instead fires off a laser that deals damage and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Kanmei's Steps | Untouchable Shadow
abilities.description: Yunara gains decaying Move Speed and becomes Ghosted. While in her Transcendent State she instead dashes in a direction.

abilities.name: Transcend One's Self
abilities.description: Yunara enters a Transcendent State that upgrades her basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Threads of Vibration
abilities.description: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

abilities.name: Shattered Earth / Upheaval
abilities.description: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile.

abilities.name: Seismic Bastion
abilities.description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

abilities.name: Ixtal's Impact
abilities.description: Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around.

abilities.name: Unseen Threat
abilities.description: Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets. When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Taste Their Fear
abilities.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws , this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

abilities.name: Void Spike
abilities.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks , Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings , Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

abilities.name: Void Assault
abilities.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible , triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking , Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

abilities.name: Battle Fury
abilities.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

abilities.name: Mocking Shout
abilities.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.

abilities.name: Spinning Slash
abilities.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Undying Rage
abilities.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

abilities.name: Break the Mold
abilities.description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.

abilities.name: Shattering Strike
abilities.description: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.

abilities.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
abilities.description: Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed. Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.

abilities.name: Full Tilt
abilities.description: Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed. Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Magnet Storm
abilities.description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.

abilities.name: The Darkin Scythe
abilities.description: Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin . Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions. Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Reaping Slash
abilities.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

abilities.name: Blade's Reach
abilities.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Kayn can walk through terrain.

abilities.name: Umbral Trespass
abilities.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

abilities.name: Power Chord
abilities.description: Accelerando : Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead. Power Chord : Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

abilities.name: Hymn of Valor
abilities.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

abilities.name: Aria of Perseverance
abilities.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Song of Celerity
abilities.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.

abilities.name: Crescendo
abilities.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them.

abilities.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
abilities.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

abilities.name: Baleful Strike
abilities.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

abilities.name: Dark Matter
abilities.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.description: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

abilities.name: Primordial Burst
abilities.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

abilities.name: Fury of the North
abilities.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

abilities.name: Arctic Assault
abilities.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Winter's Wrath
abilities.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Permafrost
abilities.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

abilities.name: Glacial Prison
abilities.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

abilities.name: Bravado
abilities.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

abilities.name: Starlight's Touch
abilities.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

abilities.name: Bastion
abilities.description: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

abilities.name: Dazzle
abilities.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Cosmic Radiance
abilities.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

abilities.name: League of Draven
abilities.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

abilities.name: Spinning Axe
abilities.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

abilities.name: Blood Rush
abilities.description: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

abilities.name: Stand Aside
abilities.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.

abilities.name: Cultivation of War
abilities.description: Zaahen's attacks and abilities against enemy champions grant him stacks of Determination, gaining bonus Attack Damage per stack. When filled with Determination, Zaahen gains increased Attack Damage and can revive.

abilities.name: The Darkin Glaive
abilities.description: Zaahen slashes twice on his next attack, dealing bonus damage and healing himself. Zaahen can recast this ability to have his next attack deal bonus damage and knock up his target.

abilities.name: Dreaded Return
abilities.description: Zaahen stabs in a direction, damaging enemies hit, then pulls them toward him.

abilities.name: Aureate Rush
abilities.description: Zaahen dashes to a location and slices around himself.

abilities.name: Grim Deliverance
abilities.description: Zaahen rises then stabs downward, damaging enemies and healing for a portion of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Granite Shield
abilities.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

abilities.name: Seismic Shard
abilities.description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunderclap
abilities.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

abilities.name: Ground Slam
abilities.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

abilities.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
abilities.description: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.description: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

abilities.name: Bountiful Harvest
abilities.description: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

abilities.name: Reap
abilities.description: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.

abilities.name: Crowstorm
abilities.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

abilities.name: Night Hunter
abilities.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

abilities.name: Tumble
abilities.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Silver Bolts
abilities.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Final Hour
abilities.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter

abilities.name: Shepherd of Souls
abilities.description: The Cursed Horde: Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target is a champion or large monster or if the target dies, a grave will be dug.

abilities.name: Dark Procession
abilities.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

abilities.name: Mourning Mist
abilities.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that reduces armor, damages, slows and marks enemies. Summoned units gain move speed when moving towards marked targets.

abilities.name: Eulogy of the Isles
abilities.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

abilities.name: Sap Magic
abilities.description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Bramble Smash
abilities.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Twisted Advance
abilities.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

abilities.name: Sapling Toss
abilities.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

abilities.name: Deathbringer Stance
abilities.description: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage and heals him, based on the target's max health.

abilities.name: The Darkin Blade
abilities.description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

abilities.name: Infernal Chains
abilities.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

abilities.name: Umbral Dash
abilities.description: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.

abilities.name: World Ender
abilities.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and Move Speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.

abilities.name: Leverage
abilities.description: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Handshake
abilities.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

abilities.name: Bailout
abilities.description: Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.

abilities.name: Loyalty Program
abilities.description: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.

abilities.name: Hostile Takeover
abilities.description: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.

abilities.name: Dauntless Instinct
abilities.description: K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack. When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.

abilities.name: Ntofo Strikes
abilities.description: K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line. On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in. When All Out, cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Path Maker
abilities.description: K'Sante charges up, taking reduced damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies. When All Out, deals increased damage and no longer knocks back or stuns.

abilities.name: Footwork
abilities.description: K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased range and both gain a shield. When All Out, cooldown is reduced and speed is increased.

abilities.name: All Out
abilities.description: K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

abilities.name: Decisive Strike
abilities.description: Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

abilities.name: Courage
abilities.description: Garen passively increases his Armor and Magic Resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Demacian Justice
abilities.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Icathian Surprise
abilities.description: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Caustic Spittle
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

abilities.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
abilities.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Void Ooze
abilities.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: Living Artillery
abilities.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

abilities.name: Runic Blade
abilities.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

abilities.name: Broken Wings
abilities.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ki Burst
abilities.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

abilities.name: Blade of the Exile
abilities.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

abilities.name: Duelist's Dance
abilities.description: Fiora has revealed a Vital on this Champion. If she hits the Vital , she restores Health and gains Move Speed .

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

abilities.name: Bladework
abilities.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

abilities.name: Grand Challenge
abilities.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains Move Speed while near them. If Fiora hits all four Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

abilities.name: Iron Ambassador
abilities.description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Hammer Shock
abilities.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

abilities.name: Keeper's Verdict
abilities.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

abilities.name: Cell Division
abilities.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

abilities.name: Stretching Strikes
abilities.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.

abilities.name: Unstable Matter
abilities.description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

abilities.name: Elastic Slingshot
abilities.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

abilities.name: Let's Bounce!
abilities.description: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

abilities.name: Essence Theft
abilities.description: After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals. After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.

abilities.name: Orb of Deception
abilities.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

abilities.name: Fox-Fire
abilities.description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.

abilities.name: Spirit Rush
abilities.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

abilities.name: Organic Deconstruction
abilities.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

abilities.name: Plasma Fission
abilities.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

abilities.name: Void Rift
abilities.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

abilities.name: Tectonic Disruption
abilities.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

abilities.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
abilities.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

abilities.name: Time In A Bottle
abilities.description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

abilities.name: Time Bomb
abilities.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Chronoshift
abilities.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

abilities.name: Deceive
abilities.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location. His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

abilities.name: Jack In The Box
abilities.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Two-Shiv Poison
abilities.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.

abilities.name: Hallucinate
abilities.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Death in Lavender
abilities.description: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.

abilities.name: Void Surge
abilities.description: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.

abilities.name: Above and Below
abilities.description: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.

abilities.name: Royal Maelstrom
abilities.description: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.

abilities.name: Endless Banquet
abilities.description: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.

abilities.name: Ionian Fervor
abilities.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

abilities.name: Bladesurge
abilities.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

abilities.name: Defiant Dance
abilities.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

abilities.name: Flawless Duet
abilities.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

abilities.name: Vanguard's Edge
abilities.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.

abilities.name: Determination
abilities.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

abilities.name: Three Talon Strike
abilities.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

abilities.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
abilities.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged.

abilities.name: Audacious Charge
abilities.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets.

abilities.name: Crescent Guard
abilities.description: Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

abilities.name: Hextech Affinity
abilities.description: Gain Move Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

abilities.name: H-28 G Evolution Turret
abilities.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

abilities.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
abilities.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

abilities.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
abilities.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

abilities.name: UPGRADE!!!
abilities.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.

abilities.name: The Relentless Storm
abilities.description: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Thundering Smash
abilities.description: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, Stunning and damaging the first one he Attacks.

abilities.name: Frenzied Maul
abilities.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them. Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.

abilities.name: Sky Splitter
abilities.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.

abilities.name: Stormbringer
abilities.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health. Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.

abilities.name: Clockwork Windup
abilities.description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

abilities.name: Command: Attack
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

abilities.name: Command: Dissonance
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Command: Protect
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

abilities.name: Command: Shockwave
abilities.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

abilities.name: Dirty Fighting
abilities.description: Every three hits from Akshan's Attacks and Abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion. When Akshan Attacks, he fires an additional Attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional Attack, he instead gains Move Speed.

abilities.name: Avengerang
abilities.description: Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.

abilities.name: Going Rogue
abilities.description: Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks. When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains Move Speed and Mana Regen while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.

abilities.name: Heroic Swing
abilities.description: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.

abilities.name: Comeuppance
abilities.description: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.

abilities.name: New Destiny
abilities.description: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

abilities.name: End of the Line
abilities.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 1 second, or after colliding with terrain.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.

abilities.name: Quickdraw
abilities.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor and Magic Resist boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

abilities.name: Hextech Capacitor
abilities.description: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
abilities.description: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
abilities.description: Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds. Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.

abilities.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
abilities.description: Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance. Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

abilities.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
abilities.description: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist. Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Rock Surfing
abilities.description: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.

abilities.name: Threaded Volley
abilities.description: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.

abilities.name: Seismic Shove
abilities.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

abilities.name: Unraveled Earth
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

abilities.name: Weaver's Wall
abilities.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

abilities.name: Spiked Shell
abilities.description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Powerball
abilities.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

abilities.name: Defensive Ball Curl
abilities.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him.

abilities.name: Frenzying Taunt
abilities.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him.

abilities.name: Soaring Slam
abilities.description: Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well.

abilities.name: Martial Cadence
abilities.description: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Dragon Strike
abilities.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Golden Aegis
abilities.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Demacian Standard
abilities.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

abilities.name: Fleet of Foot
abilities.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Boomerang Blade
abilities.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

abilities.name: Ricochet
abilities.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

abilities.name: We Are More
abilities.description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Darkin Daggers
abilities.description: Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding. Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.

abilities.name: The Call of the Pack
abilities.description: Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

abilities.name: Hounds' Pursuit
abilities.description: Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield.

abilities.name: Dragon Practice
abilities.description: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Super Scorcher Breath
abilities.description: Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.

abilities.name: Achooo!
abilities.description: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

abilities.name: Flap, Flap, Flap
abilities.description: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy.

abilities.name: MMOOOMMMM!
abilities.description: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.

abilities.name: Blast Shield
abilities.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

abilities.name: Vault Breaker
abilities.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

abilities.name: Denting Blows
abilities.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Relentless Force
abilities.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

abilities.name: Cease and Desist
abilities.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

abilities.name: Divine Ascent
abilities.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

abilities.name: Celestial Blessing
abilities.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.

abilities.name: Starfire Spellblade
abilities.description: Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks. Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

abilities.name: Divine Judgment
abilities.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

abilities.name: Guerrilla Warfare
abilities.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

abilities.name: Happy Hour
abilities.description: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.

abilities.name: Drunken Rage
abilities.description: Gragas samples his latest brew for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes boisterous and belligerent, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

abilities.name: Body Slam
abilities.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

abilities.name: Explosive Cask
abilities.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Sigil of Malice
abilities.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

abilities.name: Distortion
abilities.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

abilities.name: Ethereal Chains
abilities.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

abilities.name: Adaptive Defenses
abilities.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Precision Protocol
abilities.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

abilities.name: Tactical Sweep
abilities.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.

abilities.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
abilities.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

abilities.name: Concussive Blows
abilities.description: Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows. Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.

abilities.name: Winter's Bite
abilities.description: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows .

abilities.name: Stand Behind Me
abilities.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

abilities.name: Glacial Fissure
abilities.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

abilities.name: Mortal Will
abilities.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

abilities.name: Comet Spear
abilities.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

abilities.name: Shield Vault
abilities.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

abilities.name: Aegis Assault
abilities.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

abilities.name: Grand Starfall
abilities.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

abilities.name: Darkness Rise
abilities.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

abilities.name: Obliterate
abilities.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

abilities.name: Indestructible
abilities.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

abilities.name: Death's Grasp
abilities.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Realm of Death
abilities.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.description: Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resist from all sources. Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

abilities.name: Call of the Forge God
abilities.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

abilities.name: Traveler's Call
abilities.description: Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes , his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit. Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat Move Speed.

abilities.name: Cosmic Binding
abilities.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.

abilities.name: Caretaker's Shrine
abilities.description: Reveals a Health shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.

abilities.name: Magical Journey
abilities.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

abilities.name: Tempered Fate
abilities.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

abilities.name: Void Shift
abilities.description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

abilities.name: Call of the Void
abilities.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

abilities.name: Void Swarm
abilities.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Malefic Visions
abilities.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

abilities.name: Nether Grasp
abilities.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

abilities.name: Bridge Between
abilities.description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Wilding Claw
abilities.description: Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.

abilities.name: Iron Mantle
abilities.description: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.

abilities.name: Blazing Stampede
abilities.description: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

abilities.name: Wingborne Storm
abilities.description: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Royal Privilege
abilities.description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
abilities.description: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

abilities.name: Terrashape
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

abilities.name: Supreme Display of Talent
abilities.description: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Draw a Bead
abilities.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

abilities.name: Rapid Fire
abilities.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Jump
abilities.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

abilities.name: Explosive Charge
abilities.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

abilities.name: Buster Shot
abilities.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

abilities.name: Short Fuse
abilities.description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

abilities.name: Satchel Charge
abilities.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Hexplosive Minefield
abilities.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
abilities.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.

abilities.name: Prophet of an Elder God
abilities.description: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels , and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

abilities.name: Tentacle Smash
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

abilities.name: Harsh Lesson
abilities.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

abilities.name: Test of Spirit
abilities.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

abilities.name: Leap of Faith
abilities.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

abilities.name: Triumphant Roar
abilities.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

abilities.name: The Hitman and the Seer
abilities.description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

abilities.name: Weapon Abilites
abilities.description: Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon: Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack. Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons. Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon. Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon. Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.

abilities.name: Weapon Queue System
abilities.description: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

abilities.name: Moonlight Vigil
abilities.description: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.

abilities.name: Searing Brilliance
abilities.description: Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack. When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.

abilities.name: Radiant Volley
abilities.description: Mel fires a barrage of projectiles that explode around a target location, dealing damage repeatedly to enemies within the area.

abilities.name: Rebuttal
abilities.description: Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects enemy projectiles back at the attacker, prevents her from taking damage, and grants her movement speed.

abilities.name: Solar Snare
abilities.description: Mel fires a radiant orb forward, rooting those at its center while the area around it slows enemies and deals damage over time.

abilities.name: Golden Eclipse
abilities.description: Mel strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm. Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage.

abilities.name: Spirit Abjuration
abilities.description: Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around and heal her.

abilities.name: Twofold Hex
abilities.description: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.

abilities.name: Across the Veil
abilities.description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing, becoming invisible, and gaining Move Speed for a short duration of time.

abilities.name: The Weirding
abilities.description: Aurora converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety.

abilities.name: Between Worlds
abilities.description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that slows enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.

abilities.name: Fired Up!
abilities.description: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.

abilities.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
abilities.description: Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact.

abilities.name: Cozy Campfire
abilities.description: Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point.

abilities.name: Warm Hugs
abilities.description: Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.description: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range.

abilities.name: Clean Cuts
abilities.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a Feather .

abilities.name: Double Daggers
abilities.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Deadly Plumage
abilities.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.

abilities.name: Bladecaller
abilities.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

abilities.name: Featherstorm
abilities.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

abilities.name: Transcendent
abilities.description: Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities. Dark Sphere : Syndra can hold an additional charge Force of Will : Bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak : Increased width and slows all targets Unleashed Power : Executes low health targets

abilities.name: Dark Sphere
abilities.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.

abilities.name: Scatter the Weak
abilities.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.

abilities.name: Hextech Munitions
abilities.description: A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is dealt as bonus true damage .

abilities.name: Phosphorus Bomb
