abilities.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

abilities.name: Missile Barrage
abilities.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

abilities.name: Frost Shot
abilities.description: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

abilities.name: Ranger's Focus
abilities.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

abilities.name: Hawkshot
abilities.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

abilities.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
abilities.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

abilities.name: Spider Queen
abilities.description: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

abilities.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
abilities.description: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is. Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

abilities.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
abilities.description: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Cocoon / Rappel
abilities.description: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

abilities.name: Spider Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

abilities.name: Flurry
abilities.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
abilities.description: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds. Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

abilities.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
abilities.description: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will. Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

abilities.name: Tempest / Cripple
abilities.description: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple. Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

abilities.name: Dragon's Rage
abilities.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

abilities.name: Arcane Mastery
abilities.description: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Move Speed. On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.

abilities.name: Rune Prison
abilities.description: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

abilities.name: Spell Flux
abilities.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

abilities.name: Realm Warp
abilities.description: Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux. On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

abilities.name: Shurima's Legacy
abilities.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Conquering Sands
abilities.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

abilities.name: Arise!
abilities.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

abilities.name: Emperor's Divide
abilities.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Pit Grit
abilities.description: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

abilities.name: Knuckle Down
abilities.description: Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.description: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

abilities.name: Facebreaker
abilities.description: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

abilities.name: The Show Stopper
abilities.description: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.

abilities.name: Mana Surge
abilities.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.

abilities.name: Arcanopulse
abilities.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

abilities.name: Eye of Destruction
abilities.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

abilities.name: Shocking Orb
abilities.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

abilities.name: Rite of the Arcane
abilities.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

abilities.name: More Sparkles!
abilities.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Paddle Star!
abilities.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

abilities.name: Spell Thief
abilities.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.

abilities.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
abilities.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

abilities.name: Portal Jump
abilities.description: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.

abilities.name: Carnivore
abilities.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Feral Scream
abilities.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Vorpal Spikes
abilities.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

abilities.name: Stone Skin
abilities.description: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

abilities.name: Crushing Blow
abilities.description: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Warrior Trickster
abilities.description: Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Nimbus Strike
abilities.description: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed. Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

abilities.name: Mark of the Kindred
abilities.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

abilities.name: Dance of Arrows
abilities.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

abilities.name: Wolf's Frenzy
abilities.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

abilities.name: Mounting Dread
abilities.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

abilities.name: Lamb's Respite
abilities.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

abilities.name: Voracity
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced. If Katarina picks up a Dagger , she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

abilities.name: Bouncing Blade
abilities.description: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.description: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

abilities.name: Shunpo
abilities.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Death Lotus
abilities.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

abilities.name: Colossal Smash
abilities.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

abilities.name: Winds of War
abilities.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

abilities.name: Shield of Durand
abilities.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Justice Punch
abilities.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

abilities.name: Hero's Entrance
abilities.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Damnation
abilities.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

abilities.name: Dark Passage
abilities.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

abilities.name: The Box
abilities.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.

abilities.name: Spirit of Dread
abilities.description: Hecarim gains Armor and Magic Resist. Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies, and gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.description: Hecarim gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

abilities.name: Onslaught of Shadows
abilities.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

abilities.name: Double Strike
abilities.description: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

abilities.name: Alpha Strike
abilities.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

abilities.name: Wuju Style
abilities.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

abilities.name: Highlander
abilities.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

abilities.name: Fey Feathers
abilities.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

abilities.name: Gleaming Quill
abilities.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

abilities.name: Grand Entrance
abilities.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

abilities.name: Battle Dance
abilities.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

abilities.name: The Quickness
abilities.description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

abilities.name: Drakehound's Step
abilities.description: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.

abilities.name: Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam
abilities.description: Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Repudiation
abilities.description: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage.

abilities.name: Lacerate
abilities.description: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.

abilities.name: Public Execution
abilities.description: Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned.

abilities.name: Demon Shade
abilities.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

abilities.name: Hate Spike
abilities.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes a few times.

abilities.name: Allure
abilities.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

abilities.name: Whiplash
abilities.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Last Caress
abilities.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

abilities.name: Relentless Assault
abilities.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Leap Strike
abilities.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

abilities.name: Counter Strike
abilities.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Grandmaster-at-Arms
abilities.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to deal damage around himself and strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

abilities.name: Piltover Peacemaker
abilities.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

abilities.name: Yordle Snap Trap
abilities.description: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.

abilities.name: 90 Caliber Net
abilities.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

abilities.name: Ace in the Hole
abilities.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

abilities.name: Surging Tides
abilities.description: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.

abilities.name: Aqua Prison
abilities.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
abilities.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

abilities.name: Nimble Fighter
abilities.description: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

abilities.name: Urchin Strike
abilities.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

abilities.name: Seastone Trident
abilities.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

abilities.name: Playful / Trickster
abilities.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

abilities.name: Chum the Waters
abilities.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

dive.name: Dive Composition
dive.description: Aggressively engage onto enemy backline, killing carries before fight begins
dive.win_condition: Instantly eliminate enemy carries with coordinated dive

poke.name: Poke Composition
poke.description: Whittle enemies from range before committing to fights
poke.win_condition: Force enemy to fight at HP disadvantage or retreat from objectives
execution_tips: Maintain distance, don't get engaged on
Only fight when enemy is low

protect.name: Protect the Carry
protect.description: Funnel resources into hypercarry, keep them alive to scale
protect.win_condition: Scale to late game, win teamfights through sustained DPS
execution_tips: Peel for carry, ignore enemy frontline

pick.name: Pick Composition
pick.description: Find isolated targets, burst them down
pick.win_condition: Create numbers advantage through assassination before objectives

splitpush.name: Splitpush Composition
splitpush.description: Apply pressure in side lanes, force difficult decisions
splitpush.win_condition: Trade objectives through map pressure, win 1v1/1v2 in sidelane
execution_tips: Main group doesn't fight, just stalls
Splitpusher must survive, not just push

teamfight.name: Teamfight Composition
teamfight.win_condition: Force grouped fights, land multiple ultimates on clustered enemies

front_to_back.name: Front-to-Back Teamfight
front_to_back.description: Traditional teamfight with tank frontline protecting carries
front_to_back.win_condition: Win extended 5v5 fights through sustained damage and peel

skirmish.name: Skirmish Composition
skirmish.description: Win through early skirmishes and snowball advantage
skirmish.win_condition: Get early leads through 2v2, 3v3 fights and snowball

synergies.description: Orianna attaches ball to Nocturne. Nocturne R delivers guaranteed Orianna R to backline.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Ball follows allied champion through dashes and blinks
execution_notes: Shield Nocturne before he ults
Communicate primary target
Best when enemies are grouped

synergies.description: Jarvan R traps enemies in Cataclysm, guaranteeing Orianna R hits multiple targets.
execution_notes: Jarvan engages first
Orianna follows with ball + R

Lulu provides attack speed (W), shields (E), peel (polymorph), and emergency health (R).
execution_notes: Max W for attack speed buff
Save polymorph for divers

execution_notes: Coordinate target
Shen R during Nocturne flight

synergies.description: Kalista R launches bound Thresh into enemy team for massive CC chain.
execution_notes: Thresh charges Flay during flight
Hook immediately on landing

synergies.description: Amumu R roots enemies in place for full Miss Fortune R channel.
Twitch invisible engage + Lulu attack speed + Pix damage = devastating teamfight.
Galio R follows any ally dive, providing damage reduction and knockup on landing.
Samira passive extends CC duration when attacking CC'd targets, building S rank faster.
Riot-designed lovers duo. Shared recall animation, Rakan W range extended toward Xayah, Xayah E buffs Rakan.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Rakan's Grand Entrance has bonus range when dashing to Xayah. Both gain movement speed when near each other.
execution_notes: Rakan can engage from further away with Xayah nearby
Use shared recall for faster rotations
Coordinate Rakan engage with Xayah feather setup

synergies.description: Fasting Senna meta - Tahm Kench farms while Senna scales via soul collection without CS.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Senna gains souls from minions she doesn't kill. Tahm Kench provides protection and engage while taking farm.
execution_notes: Tahm Kench takes all CS
Senna focuses on poking and soul collection
Tahm W saves Senna from ganks

synergies.description: Funnel comp - Taric R makes Yi invulnerable during his Alpha Strike resets.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Taric ult grants invulnerability. Yi's resets during teamfights become unstoppable when timed with Cosmic Radiance.
execution_notes: Taric ults as Yi engages
Yi must time Alpha Strike with Taric R delay
Mid Yi with support Taric or jungle funnel

best_partners.reason: Immobile, benefits from speed and revive
Reset champion, revive enables more resets
Stealth + speed for flanks, revive for safety
Immobile, needs protection
Speed enhances kiting, revive extends fights

synergies.description: Zilean provides speed boost for kiting and ultimate gives hypercarries a second life.
Cataclysm traps enemies inside Equalizer for maximum burn damage.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Jarvan R creates impassable terrain, forcing enemies to stay in Rumble R AoE.
execution_notes: Rumble ults first, Jarvan follows with Cataclysm
Enemies must flash or die in the fire
Works best in narrow jungle corridors

synergies.description: Lucian's double-tap passive instantly procs Braum's Concussive Blows for easy stuns.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Braum passive requires 4 hits to stun. Lucian's passive fires two shots, accelerating the proc significantly.
execution_notes: Braum Q applies first stack
Lucian passive adds 2 stacks instantly
One more auto from either completes stun

synergies.description: Yuumi attached to Rengar remains invisible during his ultimate leap assassination.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Yuumi's attachment persists through stealth. Rengar leaps from invisibility with Yuumi healing and buffing.
execution_notes: Yuumi stays attached during Rengar R
Both appear when Rengar leaps
Yuumi R can follow up for CC

synergies.description: Leona E+Q+R chain lockdown guarantees full Miss Fortune Bullet Time channel.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Leona provides 2-3 seconds of hard CC, more than enough for MF's full R duration.
execution_notes: Leona engages with E
Q stun into R for extended lockdown
MF Rs immediately after Leona CC lands

synergies.description: Lore brothers with shared knockup synergy - either can set up the other's ultimate.
synergies.mechanic_explanation: Both have knockups (Yone R, Yasuo Q3). Either knockup enables the other's ult. Yone R can set up Yasuo R.
execution_notes: Yone R knockup enables Yasuo R
Yasuo Q3 enables Yone R follow-up
Both scale well, double crit threat

synergies.description: Double poke lane with strong catch potential from Ashe R into Zyra root.

execution_notes: Poke with Ashe W and Zyra Q/E
Ashe R for hard engage when needed
Zyra plants zone enemies
